caption.title: GLACE-CMIP5 CTL NBP.
caption.p: NBP predicted through the 21 st century for the CTL runs of the GLACE-CMIP5 models listed in Extended Data Table 1 ( a). The multi-model mean value of the GLACE-CMIP5 runs, and the multi-model mean of 17 CMIP5 models from RCP8.5 are also displayed. Models used from RCP8.5 are also listed ( b).
